header
Contacting Melting Pot
We’d like to invite you to contact us anytime regarding your experience at any of our Melting Pot locations.
/ header
custom2
/ custom2
content
area1
Whether you’d like to pass along some helpful feedback or you want to share a great idea for a new menu item, we’d love to hear from you, so reach out to the Melting Pot today!
Office Location
The Melting Pot Restaurants, Inc.
7886 Woodland Center Blvd.
Tampa, FL 33614
813-881-0055
1-800-783-0867
Restaurant Locations
Visit our
Locations
page to find a Melting Pot restaurant near you and their current offerings.
Guest Relations
Visit our
Guest Relations
page to submit comments, suggestions, and questions.
Media Relations
Visit our
Press Room
for press releases, news, and more.
Human Resources
Visit our
Careers
page for information on our career opportunities.
Accessibility
Visit our
Accessibility
page for information on our efforts to create an accessible website.
Privacy
Visit our
Privacy Policy
page for information about how we collect, use, disclose, and store information.
If you reside in a state with a Consumer Privacy Protection law or live in the European Union and would like to submit a request regarding your Personal Information we hold about you, please fill out this
Web Form
.

Featured Event
Lets Partner Up For Your Cause
Fundue-raiser Events
With many events under our belt we would love to help your with your favorite non-profit. Let us host a fundraiser at The Melting Pot. A portion of the proceeds will be donated to your charity of choice that we partner with. See store for details. Call and Ask for Baris. 954-755-6368
